root.name: MegaTraveller 2: Quest for the Ancients
root.description: OverviewLike its predecessor, MegaTraveller 2 is based on the Traveller universe from the tabletop role playing book series. The game was co-designed by Marc Miller, the original designer of the Traveller RPG.On the planet of Rhylanor, unidentified culprits have activated an ancient alien machine that threatens to cover the entire planet in an unpleasant layer of slime. The player forms a team of adventurers to seek out the secrets of the Ancients and save the planet.
